description: Adds a policy statement object. To retrieve a list of existing policy statements, use the GetPolicy API.

parameters.name: arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource that will be accessed by the principal.

parameters.name: statementId
parameters.description: A statement identifier that differentiates the statement from others in the same policy.

parameters.name: effect
parameters.description: Determines whether the permissions specified in the policy are to be allowed ( Allow) or denied ( Deny).

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The action that the principal can use on the resource. For example, entityresolution:GetIdMappingJob, entityresolution:GetMatchingJob. (string) ---

parameters.name: principal
parameters.description: The Amazon Web Services service or Amazon Web Services account that can access the resource defined as ARN. (string) ---

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource that will be accessed by the principal.

nested_items.name: token
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the current revision of the policy.
